name: Foreverland
description:
Escape to a place where anything is possible.

Foreverland is a 3D open-world adventure taking you into the mind of Sammy McCormack - Architect, Fashion Designer and Inter-disciplinary, who's vision is to innovate, and use his work as a way to positively impact people all around the world.

Immerse yourself in a digital theme-park in the sky - filled with colour, music and life. While unlocking real-world prizes through open-world single player games. 

Welcome to Foreverland, we hope you enjoy your stay!
